titles.title: A bill to allow the obsolete submarine United States ship Blenny to be transferred to the State of Maryland before the expiration of the otherwise applicable 60-day congressional review period.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Seapower and Strategic and Critical Materials.
House Committee on Armed Services Discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.subcommittee: Seapower and Strategic and Critical Materials
committee.name: House Armed Services

bill.summary: 10/6/1987--Introduced. Allows the obsolete submarine U.S.S. Blenny to be transferred by the Secretary of the Navy to the State of Maryland before the expiration of the otherwise-applicable 60-day congressional review period.
